The Me Me Meme

Nov 08, 2008

I was running around on the Internets just now and ran into Matt Darby’s The Me Meme post. Alright, I’ll do it.

Pay it forward instructions:

  1. Take a picture of yourself right now
  2. Don’t change your clothes, don’t fix your hair…just take a picture. (should be super-easy with Photobooth)
  3. Post that picture with NO editing
  4. Post these instructions with your picture
